quality.description: A value from 0 (worst) to 100 (best) indicating the JPEG quality.

minWidth.label: Minimum Width
minWidth.description: Only extract images with a width greater than or equal to `Minimum Width` (in pixels).

minHeight.label: Minimum Height
minHeight.description: Only extract images with a height greater than or equal to `Minimum Height` (in pixels).

minArea.label: Minimum Area
minArea.description: Only extract images with an area greater than or equal to `Minimum Area` (in pixels).

filter.description: Only extract specific images - eg. ones with a width greater than 100 pixels.
